name: God of Shadows
description:
"God of Shadows" is a puzzle game based on the interaction with the environment, using the shadows in your benefit.

You play as Erebus, the god of darkness. Join him on the journey to discover his origins.

Use your mind to fill the world with shadows and solve the puzzles and reach the goals.

Shadows are your friend, light is your enemy.

GAME CONTROLS:

- MOVE THE SHADOWS: A,D

- MOVE EREBUS: LEFT MOUSE
